item.title: Git
item.description: Display branches before remove git remote -v Remove remote git remote remove origin #Add new remote git remote add origin git@github.com:BonaparteIT/skimpel-admin-panel.git Git submodule Changing Git submodule repository

item.title: Start
item.description: Hello, my name is Mykola and this is my blog. I love my job as a programmer and I want to share with you my life and work in this blog. The blog was created on Hugo. Hugo allows to create a blog post in markdown language, what in my case brings a pleasure. Theme that was used is Cactus. The blog is deployed on GitHub pages. There is good video about deployment.
